definition: Panlong district of Kunming city 昆明市[Kun1 ming2 shi4], Yunnan

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
Panlong district of Kunming city 昆明市[Kun1 ming2 shi4], Yunnan
lit. coiled dragon, crouching tiger (idiom)/fig. talented individuals in hiding/concealed talent

sentences.english: Square columns surrounded on all sides dragon, column bases carved out of squatting lion.
sentences.chinese: 坊柱四面盘龙环绕，柱础雕出蹲狮。

sentences.english: I'm in Class One, Grade Three.
sentences.chinese: 我在盘龙小学三年级一班。

sentences.english: That evening, panlong company letter to Hou Dewen held a welcome dinner.
sentences.chinese: 当天晚上，盘龙信公司的人给侯德文举行欢迎晚宴。

sentences.english: This is the earliest existing Panlong Temple column.
sentences.chinese: 这是我国现存最早的盘龙殿柱。

sentences.english: This monitoring experiment of the water quality of the Panlongjiang River was conducted by using the Tradescantia MCN test.
sentences.chinese: 应用紫露草微核技术对盘龙江水质进行监测。

sentences.english: A family of reptiles of the order pelycosaur ia.
sentences.chinese: 盘龙目爬行动物的一科。

definition: Azure Dragon, one of the four symbols of the Chinese constellations, also known as the Azure Dragon of the East 東方青龍|东方青龙[Dong1 fang1 Qing1 long2] or 東方蒼龍|东方苍龙[Dong1 fang1 Cang1 long2]/(slang) man without pubic hair
